"The Treasure Shop":
"The Treasure Shop is a special shop where unusual items, such as \"Quest Triggers\", are sold on a daily basis.

You can buy these items from the Shop Attendant, Shirona who is located in the Gate Area, East Quest Counter."

"There are 2 types of products.

・Purchase with Star Gems type
→Quest Triggers etc.

・Purchase with Meseta type
→Bonus Keys, Spellstones etc.

The product lineup changes daily, so be sure to check every day!"
